title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 96 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 96 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: O sing unto the LORD a new song: sing unto the LORD, all the earth.
lineList.cn: 你们要向耶和华唱新歌。全地都要向耶和华歌唱。

lineList.en: Sing unto the LORD, bless his name; shew forth his salvation from day to day.
lineList.cn: 要向耶和华歌唱，称颂他的名，天天传杨他的救恩。

lineList.en: Declare his glory among the heathen, his wonders among all people.
lineList.cn: 在列邦中述说他的荣耀，在万民中述说他的奇事。

lineList.en: For the LORD is great, and greatly to be praised: he is to be feared above all gods.
lineList.cn: 因耶和华为大，当受极大的赞美。他在万神之上当受敬畏。

lineList.en: For all the gods of the nations are idols: but the LORD made the heavens.
lineList.cn: 外邦的神都属虚无。惟独耶和华创造诸天。

lineList.en: Honour and majesty are before him: strength and beauty are in his sanctuary.
lineList.cn: 有尊荣和威严在他面前。有能力与华美在他圣所。

lineList.en: Give unto the LORD, O ye kindreds of the people, give unto the LORD glory and strength.
lineList.cn: 民中的万族阿，你们要将荣耀能力归给耶和华，都归给耶和华。

lineList.en: Give unto the LORD the glory due unto his name: bring an offering, and come into his courts.
lineList.cn: 要将耶和华的名所当得的荣耀归给他，拿供物来进入他的院宇。

lineList.en: O worship the LORD in the beauty of holiness: fear before him, all the earth.
lineList.cn: 当以圣洁的妆饰的或作为，敬拜耶和华。全地要在他面前山抖。

lineList.en: Say among the heathen that the LORD reigneth: the world also shall be established that it shall not be moved: he shall judge the people righteously.
lineList.cn: 人在列邦中要说，耶和华作王，世界就坚定，不得动摇。他要按公正审判众民。

lineList.en: Let the heavens rejoice, and let the earth be glad; let the sea roar, and the fulness thereof.
lineList.cn: 愿天欢喜，愿地快乐。愿海和其中所充满的澎湃。

lineList.en: Let the field be joyful, and all that is therein: then shall all the trees of the wood rejoice
lineList.cn: 愿田和其中所有的都欢乐。那时林中的树木，都要在耶和华面前欢呼。

lineList.en: Before the LORD: for he cometh, for he cometh to judge the earth: he shall judge the world with righteousness, and the people with his truth.
lineList.cn: 因为他来了。他来要审判全地。他要按公义审判世界，按他的信实审判万民。
